abstract: Molly Wood Machine Learning column explores myriad options available for those who do not wish to buy latest smartphone on the market.
lead_paragraph: As companies put efforts into building better phones with lower price tags, a cheaper phone doesn’t require as many compromises as you might expect.

headline.main: The Best Cheaper Smartphones: Fewer Features, but Not by Much

snippet: As companies put efforts into building better phones with lower price tags, a cheaper phone doesn’t require as many compromises as you might expect.
